thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Gen Carrier

author: Gen Carrier
title: Gen Carrier
text: We are very happy with the Hoselink set we bought and I have already recommended to a family member. It was easy to put onto our existing hose but I forgot about getting a joining piece - the water pressure is so strong, as there are now no leaks, that the joining piece between 2 hoses is leaking so am buying a Hoselink joining bit. Also feel very good to support an independent Aust. local business.
